name: AnimatedSlide
desc: Widget which automatically transitions the child's offset relative to its normal position whenever the given offset changes.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: offset
fields.desc: The target offset. The child will be translated horizontally by `width * dx` and vertically by `height * dy`

nodes.name: Slide Animation Effect
desc: In this case, drag to adjust the x, y parameters to view the animation effect. The offset = x, y * the width and height of the box.
